sentences.sContent: He received a humiliating rebuff from his manager.
sentences.sCn: 他遭到经理的断然拒绝，十分丢脸。

sentences.sContent: His proposals have already been rebuffed by the governor.
sentences.sCn: 他的建议已被州长拒绝了。

synos.tran: 断然拒绝；回绝；漠不关心

trans.tranCn: 断然拒绝；回绝；漠不关心
trans.tranOther: an unkind or unfriendly answer to a friendly suggestion or offer of help
If you rebuff someone or rebuff a suggestion that they make, you refuse to do what they suggest
